vulnerability.name: Adobe Reader Client Side Vulns 8.1.2
vulnerability.author: Z. Cliffe Schreuders
vulnerability.description: Installs an old version of Adobe Reader that is vulnerable to a number of client side vulnerabilities, including Adobe util.printf() Buffer Overflow CVE-2008-2992 (although msf exploits may not be available for different versions of Windows), and Adobe PDF Escape EXE Social Engineering (No JavaScript) CVE-2010-1240 (which requires some user input).
vulnerability.solution: The victim has a vulnerable version of Adobe Reader, a malicious PDF could cause remote access (potentially with some user interaction).
